SELECT a.createdAt ,a.qaId
,b.name as userName ,b.type as userTypeDB
,d.type as qaType ,a.qaState FROM qa a LEFT JOIN user b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT JOIN qa_type_detail c on a.qaTypeDetailId=c.qaTypeDetailId LEFT JOIN qa_type d on c.qaTypeId=d.qaTypeId
WHERE b.userId=#{signedUserId}
ORDER BY a.qaId DESC
SELECT a.contents, b.pic, a.title FROM qa a LEFT JOIN qa_pic b ON a.qaId=b.qaId WHERE a.qaId=#{qaId}
SELECT a.answer,a.qaAnswerId,a.createdAt FROM qa_answer a LEFT JOIN qa b on a.qaId=b.qaId WHERE a.qaId=#{qaId} AND b.qaState='00103' ORDER BY a.qaAnswerId DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.title,c.name as userName,a.createdAt,SUM(b.viewCount) as qaView,a.qaId, d.reason FROM qa a LEFT JOIN qa_view b on a.qaId=b.qaId LEFT JOIN user c on a.userId=c.userId LEFT JOIN qa_type_detail d on a.qaTypeDetailId=d.qaTypeDetailId WHERE a.reportReasonId=6 GROUP BY a.qaId ORDER BY a.qaId DESC
